verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
THANK YOU JESUS
Words and Music by
MATT CROCKER & HANNAH HOBBS
â™© = 79

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
VERSE 1
Grace that flows like a river
Washing over me
Fount of heaven love of Christ
Overflow in me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
CHORUS
Thank You Jesus
You set me free
Christ my Saviour
You rescued me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
VERSE 2
Take this life delivered
A vessel of Your love
Wholly now devoted
To see Your kingdom come

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
BRIDGE
You've given me life
You've opened my eyes
I love You Lord
I love You Lord
You've entered my heart
You've set me apart
I love You Lord
I love You Lord
